m:MaterialTitle.title: Basic Usage
m:MaterialTitle.description: Using MaterialSplitPanel you must require to wrap two columns inside for the splitting feature.

m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel backgroundColor="black" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel grid="l6 m6 s6" backgroundColor="grey lighten-2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel grid="l6 m6 s6" backgroundColor="grey lighten-3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Styling
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can style the splitter bar easily.

m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel backgroundColor="blue" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="blue lighten-2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="blue lighten-3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Vertical Splitter
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set the axis / orientation of your splitter by addins splitter='Axis.VERTICAL'

m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel axis="VERTICAL" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="grey lighten-2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Top Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="grey lighten-3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Bottom Zone" description="Content must be added here"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Dock
m:MaterialTitle.description: Splitter Dock is the white line inside the splitter bar. When clicking into it, the splitter will collapse depends on Docking position (LEFT By Default for Horizontal Axis and TOP by Default for Vertical Axis)

m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel backgroundColor="black" dock="RIGHT" height="500px">
<!-- Content goes here -->
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Left/Right Min/Max for Horizontal Axis
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set the minimu / mmaximum splitter area on each child component

m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel leftMin="100" leftMax="400" rightMin="100" rightMax="300" backgroundColor="black" dock="RIGHT" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="grey lighten-2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Left Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 400"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="grey lighten-3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Right Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 300"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Top/Bottom Min/Max for Vertical Axis
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can set the minimum / maximum splitter area on each child component

m:MaterialPanel.demo:PrettyPre:
<m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel topMin="100" topMax="400" bottomMin="100" bottomMax="300" backgroundColor="black" axis="VERTICAL" height="500px">
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="grey lighten-2">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Top Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 400"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
<m:MaterialPanel backgroundColor="grey lighten-3">
<m:MaterialTitle textAlign="CENTER" title="Bottom Zone" description="Min: 100 and Max: 300"/>
</m:MaterialPanel>
</m.addins:MaterialSplitPanel>
